channel.title: Haven't been on for like 5 years
channel.description:
Hey guys! It's Gomeman!!! The last time I was involved in rsps I was playing,coding,living 508's and 317's. I'm interested in continuing my adventure with them, but have also realized runescape has gone so epicly shit, that Jagex is officially douche bags.
Does anyone know of a good source/client I can use that has pretty much everything like all skills etc... I just want the old feel of runescape back. a 508 will be good enough for me, maybe even 525 but I want all skills... I won't be using it online or a server... I will actually be playing singleplayer and skill :P just because I have no life. If anyone can help me out that would be great!! Thanks alot Moparscape!

item.title: Haven't been on for like 5 years
item.dc:creator: @i_call_dueces i call dueces
item.description:
@i_call_dueces wrote:

not completely sure if this is the right section. drub, go grab me the rules.

get a 718 server. if you’re gonna start, might as well start right
it’s more advance, and if you’re looking to learn (and already know basic java, not just basic server coding), then you’ll learn quite a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Haven't been on for like 5 years
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you’ve been gone a while.
lots have changed.

perhaps reading all forum rules, and all board indexes with descriptions. this way - when posting - you can use the appropriate section.

thanks.
[hr]
you’re requesting something that has everything done, just to play it. why not just go on the advertisement board and find one yourself?

Read full topic
